Description: Clay tablet; nearly complete; mathematical tables; Old Babylonian; repaired.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.217)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2000 14 May-29 Oct, Germany, Berlin, Martin-Gropius-Bau, Seven Hills – Images and Signs of the 21st Century
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
